medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a normal colonoscopy yesterday and felt fine post-procedure. Abdominal pain began this morning, becoming vague and worsening throughout the day, leading to presentation in the ED for evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: bicuspid AV, AV endocarditis treated with antibiotics, polymyalgia rheumatica treated with steroids, hypertension, aortic regurgitation and mitral regurgitation, hypercholesterolemia, right tibia-fibula fracture repair.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with breast cancer, father died of cerebral causes with a history of high blood pressure, obesity, and smoking; one daughter with unspecified syndrome.
